description:
Keep the focus on fresh lines, not winter chills. Waterproof and insulated, the Fall-Line Insulated Pants pairs mid-weight ThermoLite insulation with MEC's VarioShell membrane to keep you dry and warm on the slopes. Articulated construction and a gusseted crotch ensure unrestricted movement, whether you’re skinning up or going for a tail grab. Polyester patches keep ski edges from scuffing inner legs and hems, and a Recco reflector adds piece of mind in case of emergency.

  • 2-layer recycled nylon shell with MEC's VarioShell waterproof-breathable membrane and critically taped seams
  • Shell has a durable water repellency finish (DWR) that sheds snow and repels light rain
  • 60g ThermoLite T3 EcoMade medium loft insulation (85% recycled) has high warmth for it's weight
  • Recycled polyester lining glides over layers
  • Gusseted crotch and articulated knees allow full range of movement
  • Internal gaiters have grip elastic to cinch around boots and keep out snow
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue teams to detect and locate it
name: MEC Fall-Line Insulated Pants - Men's
